pullRequest.title: Remove unused SubtitleHelper
pullRequest.bodyText:
Found a funny md5 function which returned UUID's, did some digging found out it was used in the path of a unused function. Started cleaning, whole class was unused.
Also did some cleaning in the PlaybackController when I removed the instance of SubtitleHelper (which was not used) and removed some unsused properties/functions from Utils class.

nodes.bodyText: Seems like this may not be needed now?
